metadata.Title: CVE-2019-6794 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in GitLab Community and Enterprise Edition before11.5.8, 11.6.x before 11.6.6, and 11.7.x before 11.7.1. It allowsInformation Disclosure (issue 5 of 6). A project guest user can view thelast commit status of the default branch.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
